title: Mar King
description: "Forget the night, it was her sadness that darkened Dexter’s world."A savage apocalypse throws Dexter into isolation, where he agonizes over Sara Mar King’s death, his unresolved childhood love. Ready to end the years of torment without her, Sara barges through his camp wielding an arcane power and harboring a deep hatred for him. She’s there with a single, deadly goal.Dexter commits himself to helping Sara reach Mount Verta by crossing dangerous forest wastelands riddled with lethal elements just for a second chance with her. But, she has a disturbing secret that will prevent them from ever being together.She knows how to end the apocalypse. And he must stop her.
author: Nicolette Beebe
